text: My ne toropilis' nakazat' etikh neveruyushchikh i darovali im blaga v zemnom mire tak zhe, kak davali ikh ottsam pol'zovat'sya zemnymi blagami na protyazhenii ikh zhizni. Neuzheli oni ne vidyat, chto proiskhodit vokrug nikh? Razve oni ne zamechayut, chto My umen'shayem ikh zemlyu v yeyo granitsakh pobedami veruyushchikh? Tak oni li pobediteli ili veruyushchiye, kotorym Allakh obeshchal podderzhku i pobedu
